tuv.seg: Commenting on a planning application
Cuntas a thabhairt ar Iarratas ar chead pleanála
Anyone has the right to see a planning application made to a local authority. On payment of a fee, you also have the right to make a written submission or observation on the application
Tá sé de cheart agat breathnú ar iarratas ar chead pleanála agus má íocann tú táille cuntas nó tuairimí scríofa a thabhairt air
The submission or observation must be made within 5 weeks of the date of receipt of the planning application (by the local authority)
Ní mór an cuntas nó tuairimí a nochtadh taobh istigh de 5 sheachtain ó thagann an t-iarratas ar chead pleanála isteach chuig an údarás pleanála
Applicants for planning permission must put up a site notice and advertise in a local newspaper so you may find out about an application that way
Ní mór d'iarrthóirí ar chead pleanála fógra a chrochadh ar an suíomh agus fógra a chur i nuachtán áitiúil le deis a thabhairt duit fios a bheith agat go bhfuil an t-iarratas déanta
Local authorities must prepare weekly lists of planning applications and make them available for inspection for at least 8 weeks in their offices and public libraries

Ní mór do na húdaráis áitiúla liostaí a chur le chéile chuile sheachtain de na hiarratais ar chead pleanála atá faighte acu agus na liostaí seo a bheith ar fáil don phobal le scrúdú ar feadh 8 seachtainí ar a laghad ina n-oifigí agus sa leabharlann phoiblí
You are entitled to see all the documents submitted with a planning application, which will be kept at the offices of your local authority
Tá sé de cheart agat na cáipéisí ar fad a cuireadh leis an iarratas a fheiceáil, beidh siad ar fáil ag oifigí an údaráis áitiúil
Planning authorities cannot rule on an application until 5 weeks have elapsed from the date of its receipt
Ní féidir le údarás pleanála cinneadh a thógáil ar iarratas pleanála go dtí go bhfuil 5 sheachtain slán ó dáta an iarratais
Your comments must be in writing to your local authority
Ba cheart aon rud atá le rá agat a chur i scríbhinn chuig an údarás áitiúil
If possible, you should quote the planning application's reference number
Más féidir ba cheart an uimhir thagartha atá ag an iarratas ar chead pleanála a lua i do chomhfhreagras
You must quote your name and address and postal address (if different)
Ní mór duit freisin d'ainm agus do sheoladh féin a thabhairt chomh maith le do sheoladh poist (muna bhfuileadar mar an gcéanna)
Your submission or observation must be acknowledged by the local authority and you must be notified of the planning decision
Ní mór don údarás áitiúil admháil a chur chugat go bhfuil do chuntas nó tuairimí faighte agus ní mór scéal a chur chugat maidir leis an gcinneadh a dhéantar ar an iarratas
Your comments must be based on planning considerations, not on personal likes, dislikes or grievances
Ní mór go mbeadh na tuairimí atá le nochtadh agat bunaithe ar chúrsaí pleanála, ní féidir iad a bhunú ar chol agus bá phearsanta ná ar ghearáin
These planning considerations include:
I measc na gceisteanna pleanála gur féidir a lua tá:
• National and regional guidelines and ministerial directives
• Treoracha náisiúnta agus réigiúnda agus treoracha ón aire
• Policies and objectives of the development plan
• Polasaithe agus aidhmeanna an phlean fhorbartha
• Policies and objectives of any local plan
• Polasaithe agus aidhmeanna aon phlean áitiúil

A local plan shall be consistent with the objectives of the development plan and shall consist of a written statement and a plan or plans indicating the objectives for the proper planning and sustainable development of the area to which it applies

Ní mór go mbeadh plean áitiúil ag dul le aidhmeanna an phlean fhorbartha. Ní mór go mbeadh an plean áitiúil leagtha amach i scríbhinn agus go mbeadh sé mar aidhm aige pleanáil cheart agus forbairt inmharthanach an cheantair lena mbaineann sé a chur chun cinn
It can include detail on community facilities and amenities and on standards of design in developments and structures
Is féidir sonraí maidir le áiseanna pobail a bheith san áireamh chomh maith le caighdeáin dheartha i bhforbairtí agus structúir
• Local considerations such as site development density, parking provision, traffic hazards, overlooking, effects on residential amenity
• Ceisteanna áitiúla a bhaineann leis an méid forbartha atá ar shuíomh, soláthar áiseanna páirceála, contúirtí tráchta, a bheith ag breathnú anuas ar áiseanna eile, tionchair ar áiseanna cónaithe
• Environmental, amenity and shopping impacts
• Tionchair ar an timpeallacht, ar áiseanna agus ar siopadóireacht
Anyone who has made written submissions or observations and paid the necessary fee must be informed of the decision by the local authority within 3 days of making the decision
Ní mór don údarás áitiúil a chinneadh a chur in iúl taobh istigh de 3 lá ón lá a dhéantar é d'aon duine a thug tuairimí i scríbhinn agus a d'íoc an táille chuí maidir le iarratas ar chead pleanála

If you made a submission or observation that has been acknowledged by the local authority, you have the right to appeal its planning decision to An Bord Pleanála. You also have the right to be informed of any other appeals that have been lodged to An Bord Pleanála and to receive a copy of the appeal

Má tá cuntas nó tuairimí curtha agat ós comhair an údaráis áitiúil agus admháil faighte agat, tá sé de cheart agat achomharc a dhéanamh ar an gcinneadh a bhaineann leis an iarratas sin chuig an mBord Pleanála
The fee for making a submission or observation on a planning application in Ireland is €20
Táille de €20 atá le n-íoc ar chuntas nó tuairimí a nochtadh
